title: Tutorial
text: best way interact network instantiate Buyer object new_buyer() function.

title: Tutorial
text: Executing query : executing query, get api key ip address web dashboard create Buyer instance call query method buyer instance SQL query string print recieved query accuracy results.
code: source("sdk.r")  api_key <- "buyer_key" ip_addr <- "127.0.0.1"   buyer <- new_buyer(api_key, ip_addr)  # retrieve the query sub key query_key <- get_key(buyer) print(query_key)   # Initiate a query sql_query <- "select count(*) as numpeople from public.condition_era_death" result <- query(buyer, query_key, sql_query)  # get table columns columns <- get_columns(buyer, query_key) print(columns)
